title: How to Restore Shine to Wrought Iron Furniture

steps.headline: Make up a mixture of 1 tablespoon of baking soda with 1 liter (0.3 US gal) of water.
Sponge the wrought-iron furniture with this mixture.
Allow to dry.
steps.description: Wipe down with a soft cloth. The wrought-iron should look a lot better.

text: Make up a mixture of 1 tablespoon of baking soda with 1 liter (0.3 US gal) of water.  Sponge the wrought-iron furniture with this mixture.  Allow to dry. Wipe down with a soft cloth. The wrought-iron should look a lot better.
